CustomField.formula: IF( FLOOR(Rating__c) == 1, IMAGE("https://falikhan-220324-576-demo.my.salesforce.com/resource/1649133118000/star_rating_1?","",107,30), IF( FLOOR(Rating__c) == 2, IMAGE("https://falikhan-220324-576-demo.my.salesforce.com/resource/1649133133000/star_rating_2?","",107,30), IF( FLOOR(Rating__c) == 3, IMAGE("https://falikhan-220324-576-demo.my.salesforce.com/resource/1649133146000/star_rating_3?","",107,30), IF( FLOOR(Rating__c) == 4, IMAGE("https://falikhan-220324-576-demo.my.salesforce.com/resource/1649133157000/star_rating_4?","",107,30), IF( FLOOR(Rating__c) == 5, IMAGE("https://falikhan-220324-576-demo.my.salesforce.com/resource/1649133169000/star_rating_5?","",107,30), IMAGE("https://falikhan-220324-576-demo.my.salesforce.com/resource/1649135702000/star_rating_0?","",107,30) ) ) ) ) )
